attributes.action: Lobby the supermarkets to ower their prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to see the PM and government lobbying ALL the supermarkets to lower their prices. Prices increased due to the rising cost of fuel. This has been getting lowered but the cost of items in the supermarket haven't and one reason for that is GREED.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
